thread.section_title: 1000Bulbs.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 1000Bulbs.com | www.1000bulbs.com | 61 of 1363
thread.title: Kevin T

author: Kevin T
title: Kevin T
text:
I have found them to have competitive prices, good selection and reliable shipping.
I have had the unfortunate task of migrating almost 100 halogen to LED and had to learn the whole game and language. I end up poking around other places, but end up here due to past satisfaction.
No reservations and happy to share my time learning and finding a trusted source for this.
